## Description {#details}

Some of the values are stored in bitfields.

Since this needs to be portable across compilers and architectures (big / little endian in particular) we can&#39;t use the actual structures below, but must instead do the shifting and masking ourselves. The struct definitions are provided for reference.

Definition at line 94 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/rawtypes-h">RawTypes.h</a>.
